---

**Global Polycystic Kidney Disease Market Overview**

Polycystic kidney disease (PKD) is a genetic disorder characterized by the formation of numerous fluid-filled cysts in the kidneys, leading to progressive kidney damage and dysfunction. PKD is a significant public health issue, affecting millions of people worldwide. The market for PKD treatments is expected to grow significantly over the forecast period of 2019–2028, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of approximately 4.3%.

**Market Growth Trends**

The global PKD market is driven by several key factors, including advancements in diagnostic technologies, increased awareness of the disease, and the development of new treatment options. The rise in the prevalence of autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease (ADPKD) and autosomal recessive polycystic kidney disease (ARPKD) is also contributing to the market growth. ADPKD is the most common form of PKD, affecting approximately 1 in 400 individuals, while ARPKD is less common but more severe, affecting infants and young children.

**Market Segmentation by Disease Type**

The PKD market can be segmented into two primary disease types: ADPKD and ARPKD. ADPKD is the most prevalent form, accounting for about 85% of PKD cases. ARPKD, on the other hand, is less common but more severe, affecting infants and young children. The market for ADPKD treatments is expected to grow at a faster rate due to the increasing number of patients and the development of new therapies.

**Geographic Scope**

The global PKD market is expected to grow significantly in both developed and developing regions. North America and Europe are the key regions, with a combined market share of around 60%. The Asia-Pacific region is expected to witness the highest growth rate, driven by increasing awareness and the development of new treatment options. The Middle East and Africa are also expected to see significant growth, particularly in countries with a high prevalence of PKD.

**Data Sources**

The insights provided in this article are based on the data from https://insights10.com/. This source offers comprehensive market analysis and forecasts for the PKD market, including growth trends, key drivers, and market segmentation.

**Conclusion**

The global PKD market is expected to grow significantly over the forecast period, driven by advancements in diagnostic technologies, increased awareness of the disease, and the development of new treatment options. The market is segmented into two primary disease types: ADPKD and ARPKD, with ADPKD accounting for the majority of cases. The market is expected to grow rapidly in both developed and developing regions, with North America and Europe leading the way.

---

gts:
Japan is a country whose origins are deeply rooted in religious beliefs. Because of this, there are numerous temples and shrines to visit throughout each prefecture. Each of them have their own unique history and have created festivals to celebrate them. Here is a list of the festivals you must see and experience if you ever find yourself abroad in Nara Prefecture, Japan

Omizutori

Credit: Japan-guide.com

Omizutori, also known as the Fire Festival, is the oldest festival in Japan. Located at Todaiji Temple in Nara Prefecture, this festival has been running yearly for the past 1,250+ years. It’s held anywhere from March 1st to 14th to cleanse the people of their sins and to celebrate spring of the new year.

2. Wakakusa Yamayaki

Credit: ohmatsuri.com

It is believed that this festival started through a land dispute between Nara’s great temples, and that they burned the mountainside for peace. While the history of it is disputed, it doesn’t take away from the beauty of it all. Held on the 4th Saturday of each January, the Yamayaki festival includes several celebrations, including; the throwing competition of giant rice crackers, a breathtaking fireworks show and the burning of the side of Wakakusayama mountain.

3. Setsubun Mantoro

This astonishing festival held at Kasuga Taisha Shrine, also known as the festival of wishes, is held every February 3rd. During this festival, more than 3,000 stone and brass lanterns are lit to celebrate the transition of winter to spring. It is believed that if you have a dream or a wish that you eagerly want to come true, the shrine will help make it come true.

ANIFTY Inc. (Tokyo, Japan), the operator of ANIFTY, the first NFT marketplace for anime art, released version 2 on October 31, 2021. We are also pleased to announce that the total number of certified artists has exceeded 300.

The ANIFTY Marketplace, which specializes in anime art, was released globally on July 29, 2021 and handles NFT works by “certified artists” selected through a screening process from Japan and overseas.

Newly added features in Version 2 (V2)

In ANIFTY Marketplace V2, you will be able to sell your artworks immediately without paying Ethereum transaction fees (gas fee). ANIFTY is the first NFT marketplace in Japan to implement this technology on Layer 1 (Ethereum Mainnet). In addition, it will be possible to change the price and quantity of items even after they are listed (in such cases, the seller will have to pay for the gas).

ANIFTY Certified Artists

After the launch of the marketplace, ANIFTY welcomed a number of new certified artists. There are currently over 300 registered artists, including Tantanmen and Onigiriman, who are rapidly gaining popularity in the NFT community both in Japan and overseas, Haruki Minamura, who designed the Hololive Vtuber “Natsuiro Matsuri” ,and TAPIOCA, who illustrated the card game “Battle Spirits”.

We are looking for certified artists!

ANIFTY is looking for certified artists. If you are interested, please apply from the form below.

https://forms.gle/Ekv8jPANW4uzAtSK6

Number of Exhibits Surpasses 500

One month after the launch of Marketplace V2, the number of works on display at ANIFTY Marketplace has exceeded 500.

Auction function to be released in early 2022

We are pleased to announce that we will be releasing an auction function in early 2022. The auction function will allow collectors to bid on a limited number of NFT pieces to determine the price. Smart contract technology will enable selling and bidding for gas-free.

About ANIFTY

ANIFTY Inc. is a start-up company that was selected for the 5th and 6th CO.NECT University of Tokyo Blockchain Entrepreneurship Support Program, and was established with the support of the University of Tokyo Blockchain Innovation Endowed Chair.

Official website: https://anifty.jp/

gts:
Global oilfield chemicals market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 4.21% during the forecast period of 2019–2026 and attain a value of USD 158.4 million by 2026.

Get more information on this report: Request Sample Pages

Oilfield chemicals are components available in liquid forms, widely used in oil & gas drilling projects for amendments in oil & gas exploration field operations. Drilling and production facilities mainly utilizes these chemicals to improve productivity and efficiency of the process & petroleum refining as well as to attain optimum performance with effective oil recovery. Oilfield chemicals promotes the maintenance of smooth operating oilfield, resulting in reduction of expenses over setbacks and stoppage faced during drilling processes. Additionally, they obstruct the formation of the metal scales and diminish the water level into the oil well during exploration & drilling, which positively affects in increasing demand and applications of oilfield chemicals.

The global oilfield chemicals market is growing exponentially and predicted to experience rapid growth during the forecast period 2019–2026. The factors majorly driving the growth of oilfield chemicals at global scale include growing exploration and drilling practices for natural resources such as oil and gas, rise in crude oil production, and need to reduce the gap between supply and demand chain. According to OECD, the crude oil production across the world is 3.97 million during the financial year 2017.

Furthermore, increasing population has amplified the energy requirements and to cope with energy demands more oil & gas E&P activities have been under taken to suffice the residential as well as industrial energy demand. This aspect has been boosting the growth of oilfield chemicals market.

Additionally, shift in inclination towards exploring the unconventional hydrocarbon sources is likely to infiltrate the market growth. Various advantages such as corrosion resistance, demulsification & paraffin dispersants, and repair system for cementing failures offered by the product further increases the demand for the product and is expected to fuel the market growth over the projected period 2019–2026.

For more information on oilfield chemicals Market, please click here.

Article by Michael D’Antonio

For those who enjoy the finer things that life has to offer, there are abundant opportunities to travel. You’ll find five-star hotels that have everything from gorgeous landscapes to luxurious spas. The world has so many breathtaking panoramas and thrilling adventures to offer now. You can relax in your hotel and enjoy the accommodations or venture out to explore the area.

If you have a special area of interest, then fine tune your travel experience accordingly. For instance, those who love cycling might put together a trip to Salt Lake City, Utah to cycle through the Great Salt Lake to Antelope Island. If you love museums, there are unforgettable exhibits at the Metropolitan Museum in New York, as well as the Uffizi Gallery in Florence, which is hundreds of years old.

Most of these international hotels offer delicious cuisines, which are an adventure within themselves.

Read the full article at https://michaeldantonioimpatto.com/10-best-international-hotels-for-avid-jet-setters/

### Testimonial: A 37 lbs Weight Loss Journey

John, a 45-year-old software engineer, was struggling with his weight for years. He tried various diets and exercise routines, but nothing seemed to work. That is, until he discovered CircadiYin. gts: CicardiYin is a dietary supplement that helps people to lose weight without the need of doing restrictive diets or intense exercises. As your age advances, it gets harder to lose weight. However, this product does not only help you lose weight but also boost your metabolism by restoring your circadian rhythm. It is an all-natural, vegan-friendly weight loss supplement that contains a mixture of clinically proven ingredients. You do not have to worry about any side effects since this formula does not contain any chemicals and toxins. Does CircadiYin Works? Yes. CircadiYin is a weight loss supplement that can help you burn fat from all the stubborn areas of your body in no time. It does this by restoring the circadian rhythm. The circadian rhythms are the internal clocks in our brain that work all day. Our mental, physical and behavioral changes follow this 24-hour cycle that regulates alertness and sleepiness by responding primarily to light and dark. This is why most living things sleep at night and are awake during the day

gts:
InPoker announces partnership with DareNFT, an NFT 2.0 protocol that brings innovation to the world of digital assets InPoker Nov 23, 2021·2 min read

InPoker and DareNFT are pleased to announce they have entered into a strategic partnership to combine DareNFT’s innovative NFT ecosystem with InPoker ambitious e-sports vision.

DareNFT is an universal NFT 2.0 protocol for digital assets. DareNFT has developed a suite of products to address some of the challenges in the NFT landscape, including unrecognized benefits between NFTs, unrecognized relationships between NFT owners and hidden risks of NFT ownership. There are many content types out there and whereas the content types matter at application level, the licensing protocol layer is the same for all of them. Therefore, there is only one protocol needed to serve all.

The existing licencing processes of derivative content are mostly manual and time consuming. With an NFT 2.0 smart contract, these processes can be automated. Derivative content such as: song remixes, subtitled videos, edited images, learning contents, translated book often generates revenue from the rental and subscription business model. Creators can receive royalties from reproducer’s revenue via the NFT smart contract. This speeds up collaboration and sharing of benefits between the author and re-publisher, resulting in more income for both parties.

The advent of the NFT 2.0 protocol that DareNFT proposes can mark a new milestone for nonfungible tokens and the crypto market in general. The platform’s competitive advantage is its ability to adapt to emerging trends, banking on its NFT 2.0 protocol which is an essential element for building a thriving platform.

DareNFT will provide InPoker with the access to its ecosystem and the NFT marketplace where InPoker plans to list some of the Elite NFT membership cards. This long-term partnership marks a significant milestone in InPoker’s efforts to introduce the cutting edge technologies to online gaming.

Visit DareNFT: https://darenft.com/

Stay tuned for more exciting developments on https://www.inpoker.io

Join our official Telegram Channel here: https://t.me/influencerpoker

When most people here or think about accounting, they often associate it with a practice that is carried out in large complex institutions. Another fascinating thing is cost accounting; many people associate it with production companies. For the records, that is not very correct. Let us look at some eye opening questions.

At PEOTEF

How much does it take you to serve that product to a client? Do you have a specific response or it depends? How much does it take you to provide that service to that client? Do you know what direct cost is? What about indirect or overheads cost? What if you knew how to classify these costs appropriately either by function, behavior or nature? Let me ask this unusual question for those who own schools. How much does it cost you to train one student or pupil per semester? What costs did you take into consideration in this process? On what bases did you apportion your overheads?

Follow me.

What if as a business owner, you knew the cost of adding an extra service to your business? What if you knew the exact cost of adding an extra service to your line of services? What if you knew the exact cost of adding a new client to the number of clients you already have? Do you know the concept of Marginal costing and revenue?

When someone mentions something about a business breaking even; what comes to your mind? I'm sure you will definitely it is that time in a business when there is neither a profit nor loss. You are right. Permit me to ask. What happens in the case of a business that has been operating, and then launches a new product? Will their profit levels remain the same if they do not make profits on the new product? Is it possible to ascertain the cost of the new product and determine when that product alone will breakeven?

Thank you for your time. Keeping thinking (I am working on a book that will help you out in masterfully crafting answers to the above questions)

Ngong g George Fonyuy (Accountant, Auditor, Entrepreneur)

Great! Here’s a draft of the article using the structure you provided:

---

**Health Is Not Fitness, But We Need Both**

In today's fast-paced world, the terms "health" and "fitness" are often used interchangeably, but they represent fundamentally different concepts. While fitness is a measure of physical well-being and the ability to perform specific activities, health encompasses a broader range of factors that contribute to overall well-being. Let’s explore the distinction between health and fitness and why both are essential for a balanced and fulfilling life.

**Understanding Health**

Health is a multifaceted concept that includes physical, mental, and social well-being. It encompasses a wide array of factors such as nutrition, exercise, sleep, stress management, and social support. Health is not just the absence of disease; it is a state of complete physical, mental, and social well-being. By focusing on health, we aim to improve our quality of life and reduce the risk of chronic diseases.

**Fitness: A Narrow Focus**

Fitness, on the other hand, is a more specific and measurable aspect of health. It typically refers to the ability to perform physical activities and maintain a certain level of physical fitness. Fitness can be assessed through various metrics such as body mass index (BMI), cardiovascular endurance, muscular strength, and flexibility. While fitness is important, it is just one component of overall health.

**The Connection Between Health and Fitness**

While health and fitness are distinct concepts, they are not mutually exclusive. In fact, a healthy lifestyle is often the foundation for achieving optimal fitness. By focusing on health, we can improve our physical and mental well-being, which in turn enhances our fitness levels. For example, regular exercise can strengthen our muscles and improve our cardiovascular health, but it is only one part of the equation. A balanced diet, adequate sleep, and stress management are also crucial for maintaining optimal fitness.

**Why Both Are Important**

Both health and fitness are essential for a healthy and fulfilling life. Health provides the foundation for physical and mental well-being, while fitness enhances our ability to perform daily activities and enjoy physical pursuits. By prioritizing both, we can achieve a balanced and sustainable lifestyle that supports our overall well-being.

In conclusion, while fitness is an important aspect of health, it is just one component of a broader and more comprehensive approach to well-being. By focusing on health, we can improve our physical and mental well-being, which in turn enhances our fitness levels. Let’s strive to achieve a balance between health and fitness to lead a healthy and fulfilling life.

---

Feel free to review this draft and let me know if you have any suggestions or if you want to make any adjustments.
</response>
gts:
What is the meaning of fitness? Well, that depends on who you ask. The word fitness can be spread thin when it comes to defining what it is. Fitness can have a different meaning for different groups because it is activity-specific.

Physical fitness for a powerlifter is not the same kind of fitness for a triathlete. In general, physical fitness is being able to apply the required strength and energy to complete specific physical activities. If a powerlifter cannot complete a triathlon, then he would not be considered fit among a group of competing triathletes.

Health is different from fitness, but like fitness, there are variations of health. In general, health is being free from illness and sustaining overall wellness. Within this concept, the dimensions of health are physical, mental, and social. Having a healthy body that is not affected by disease or physical impairments is a general description of physical health.

Good mental health is more than just the absence of mental illness. It means you are in a state of well-being where you feel good and function well in the world. Some keys to being in a state of good mental health are:

the ability to learn

the ability to feel, express, and manage a range of positive and negative emotions

the ability to form and maintain good relationships with others

the ability to cope with and manage change and uncertainty.

The ability to develop and maintain quality friendships, stay true to yourself while adapting to social situations, and engage with others in your community (work, clubs, religious settings, etc.) are all signs of good social health.

Health and fitness are often conflated because neither can be attained without proper nutrition. Yes, your mental health is impacted by a poor diet. Nutritional information is a description of how you are either contributing to health and fitness, which are dimensions of wellness or feeding into sickness and disease.

As a game developer, you want to reach new markets, expand your business, increase your fan base and sales around the globe, but mostly in Western and Eastern Europe. What does it mean? And why is the German market important for the gaming industry? Which are its special characteristics that make you consider localizing your game for the German audience?

Well, let’s start with the beginning.

Expanding your game in Europe means you address a mature market. Generating revenue of $29.6 Billion in 2020 and having a 7.8% increase YoY, Europe is the third game market in the world, after Asia-Pacific and North America.

However, localization for the European market is complex, as the audience is very unique due to the variety of languages that they have in their respective countries in the region.

Typically, video games consumed in Europe would always receive translation and localization. If in the previous articles we explained why it’s important to localize for the Polish, Finish, Swedish, Dutch and Danish markets, with this post we’ll start our series of articles about localization for Western Europe.

Basically, this means to translate and adapt your game from all points of view to the four audiences: French, Italian, German, and Spanish. This practice is so popular across many industries, that the translation made for this region even has received its own acronym — FIGS or EFIGS if we also include English.

With a gaming industry revenue of $6,084 million, the German market was the fifth market around the world in 2020 and it’s also a very complex one. Therefore, we considered we should focus on this audience, helping you to better understand what the localization in the German language involves and how you could conquer this market.

gts:
3. $BRIX: Utility Token, Distribution & Use Cases

Your NFTs accumulate a utility token (“$BRIX”) which holders can exclusively claim on our website — https://propertys.xyz. The go-live will be announced at the end of 2021.

Every month holders can claim $BRIX for the NFT cards they own. $BRIX is built for one purpose and one purpose only: to enable you to exchange for more NFTs & metaverse objects and exclusive access to events within the Property’s ecosystem.

$BRIX has no other functionality other than within the Property’s ecosystem, and it cannot be purchased from Property’s developers. Property’s developers do not provide or intend to provide a secondary market for $BRIX.

Do not expect monetary gains from $BRIX. $BRIX is not intended to give you financial rewards — it will not “make you money”. $BRIX is intended to be used as a means of exchange for our digital and physical products & events — it may “save you money” that you would otherwise have to pay to acquire these assets.

Claiming $BRIX

Every building has a unique, randomized code that can only be claimed once per period — this prevents double-claiming on an NFT and keeps the tokenomics intact. The $BRIX you can claim depend on your holdings. Every holder regardless of the amount they may own is entitled to $BRIX if they register their holdings for a given period. The period is always a month.

4. Collecting Game: The Mechanics

Before we dive into the mechanics — which are fairly simple — it’s important to understand the distinction between special cards and regular cards and the way these regular cards can combine into pure & impure streets.

Card Tiers Single Houses Forming Pure Combos Forming Impure Combos Special Buildings $BRIX Bonuses

Card Tiers

There are 7 cities and 120 special buildings. The 7 cities are separated into 3 tiers — giving low-high amounts of $BRIX. The 120 special buildings are separated into 20 of 20, 5 of 5, and 1 of 1 cards. Again lower to higher amounts of $BRIX.

Single Houses

A single house — 1 NFT, collects $BRIX as standalone, you do not need to complete any of the combos to collect $BRIX. These combos give bonuses, but should not be the reason anyone is excluded from the Property’s ecosystem.

**Art Writing Exercise #2: Watercolor Style and Allure vs. Disgust**

In this exercise, we explore how the watercolor style can create a realistic yet evocative image, balancing the allure and revulsion that viewers might experience. The image features a delicate watercolor painting of a tea egg, surrounded by a scene that highlights the contrast between beauty and disgust.

The tea egg itself is a focal point, with its rich, golden color and intricate details. The white powder next to the tea egg adds a subtle, almost imperceptible element that enhances the overall texture and realism of the image. This detail is crucial in creating a sense of depth and realism.

The foreground of the image includes a spinach wonton soup, which is partially ruined by a cigarette butt. The wilted spinach and the greasy residue of the cigarette butt together evoke a sense of decay and neglect, adding to the overall tension and emotional impact of the scene.

The tea egg and the spinach wonton soup are both central to the image, but they serve different purposes. The tea egg represents the refined and luxurious aspects of the scene, while the spinach wonton soup symbolizes the more mundane and potentially unpleasant elements. The contrast between these two elements is what makes the image compelling and thought-provoking.

Why did someone ruin the soup with the cigarette without even finishing the soup first?

The white highlight dots scattered on top of the wontons and spinach contribute to the glossy wetness. The ingenious discoloration on some of the yellowed spinach, a sign of decay and imperfection, makes this soup even more convincing. Chopped spring onions and a fractured leaf of cilantro floating in the foreground invites the tongue to touch them. The brown soup almost looks like there is miso in there, as if smoke is spreading nebulously. The runny egg yolk looks good, but the egg white engulfing is looks disgusting. The contrast of allure and disgust is what makes this picture great.

gts:
WHAT IS A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

Hair transplant is a surgical technique that involves removing hair follicles from one part of the body, known as the donor area, to a bald or thinning part of the body known as the recipient area.

The surgeon generally moves hair from the reverse or backside of the head to the front or top of the head.

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic performs hair transplantation procedures under anesthesia.

Pattern baldness is responsible for the majority of hair loss. This comes down to genetics. The remaining cases are due to a variety of factors, including.

diet

stress

illness

hormonal imbalance

medications

If anyone is looking for Best Hair Transplant Clinic in India then he/she should surely consult VHCA Hair Clinic, because it’s India's first Ayurvedic Hair Clinic.

WHAT HAPPENS DURING A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Clinic is the best hair transplant clinic in India as here doctors have more than 25 plus years of expertise and have performed more than 3000 hair transplants.

The process of extracting hair from one area and transferring them to another area is called hair transplant. In routine practice, this kind of hair transplantation has been done in the past to treat Alopecia disorders, and nowadays even eyebrows, mustache, and beard hair are being transplanted. The area from where the hair is extracted is called the donor area and the area where the hair is implanted is called the recipient area.

WHAT HAPPENS AFTER A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic — the best hair transplant clinic in India after completing the Hair Transplants procedures, gives a follow-up therapy with ayurvedic medicines such as:

Ayurvedic Medicines to support hair growth in hair follicles.

Some anti-inflammatory medicines.

Some medicines o make the healing fast.

Most of the people after taking hair transplants from VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic can return to work after 5 to 7 days, or in some other cases, a patient has to take rest for some 7 to 15 days even.

**Safe Holiday Travel Tips: Cancellations, Mask Effectiveness, and Industry Challenges**

With the holiday travel season in full swing, travelers are bracing for potential disruptions. According to recent data, there have been over 6000 flight cancellations during the busy season. This is a significant increase from previous years, highlighting the need for travelers to be prepared.

One of the biggest concerns for travelers is the effectiveness of masks. Recent debates have intensified, with some airlines and industry leaders advocating for mask mandates. For instance, Southwest Airlines CEO Gary Kelly tested positive for COVID-19 after a maskless hearing, sparking discussions about the role of masks in preventing the spread of the virus.

The airline industry is facing its own set of challenges. Staff shortages and health protocols have become major hurdles. Airlines are implementing new measures to ensure safety, but the ongoing staffing issues are causing delays and cancellations. gts:
6000+ Cancelled flights on the busiest travel time of the year

How do you know who to trust?

Here is a little food for thought.

The airline industry is in the midst of a record-breaking winter crisis, with thousands stranded around Christmas time. As if it wasn’t enough that flights were canceled on top days like Christmas Eve and Christmas day there have been over 1,700 US flights canceled because there are too many employees with positive Covid tests.

(CNN Business) Major US airlines canceled hundreds of more flights Sunday, the third day in a row of mass cancellations and delays over Christmas weekend, as staff and crew call out sick amid the Omicron surge.

This comes on the heels of several airline CEOs telling congress they don’t think masks “add anything” to the safety of flying.

The Airline CEOs were testifying to Congress about how they spent the Covid money they received during the pandemic. They made headlines by questioning the effectiveness of masks on airlines with the results of a study done on mannequins.

According to Forbes.com, the studies the CEOs had referenced were “done with mannequins who were sitting straight forward with masks on, not removing them, not eating at any point in time,” Nelson said. “So it is important to recognize that the safe controlled environment on the plane is a layered safety protocol, which includes the sanitation of the aircraft and includes the service procedures and includes the HEPA filtration that is not on all aircraft, by the way, and it includes everyone wearing the masks.”

Interestingly enough, the CEO of Southwest Airlines Gary Kelly tested positive with Covid-19 two days after appearing at the hearing maskless. He is fully vaccinated, boosted, and still contracted Covid. He didn’t make an informed decision. Don’t be like Gary. Listen to the scientist and the data.

Can face masks help slow the spread of the coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) that causes COVID-19? Yes. Face masks combined with other preventive measures, such as getting vaccinated, frequent hand-washing, and physical distancing, can help slow the spread of the virus.

Mayo Clinic

Wild ML (+104) vs Stars

gts:
Speak Spanish From Day One.

The first thing I discovered upon my arrival in Caracas was that I remembered much less Spanish than I thought I did. As it had been over five years since I had taken a Spanish course I guess I really shouldn’t have been surprised right? Who can really expect to remember much from a high school course that was mediocre at best? As I tried desperately to order a simple sandwich and something to drink, I realized that if I didn’t at least attempt to learn Spanish I would most likely starve after a week or so.

How exactly does one go about learning Spanish in a Latin American country? Seems pretty easy right? Well, I assure you it is not, especially when your entire day is spent speaking English. Another obstacle that I quickly encountered was the very rapid way in which everyone speaks in this city. It is amazing how a sentence containing 10 words or so can come out sounding almost like one long word. Is that what English sounds like to people who don’t speak English? It is exceedingly difficult to learn words in another language when you are unable to decipher exactly where one word ends and another begins. This process is made even harder by the fact that most people here fail to pronounce the whole word anyway. There were many words that I was convinced I knew and was using quite frequently. Imagine my dismay when I found out they had whole other syllables on the end of the word. No wonder I had been getting funny looks from people on the street and in restaurants.

I eventually came to the conclusion that an actual course was needed or even better, a private tutor of some sort. The only way I was ever going to learn Spanish was by actually sitting down and studying with someone who could answer the myriad of questions that arose every day. Sad isn’t it? Here I sit, living in a Latin American country and I am unable to pick up the language without resorting to private lessons. Some people seem to have an ear for languages and can pick them up simply by listening, too bad I will never be one of those people.

ACCESS SPANISH LANGUAGE COURSES RIGHT NOW

gts:
Job Title: Waiter/Waitress — Mada Hotels Jobs 2021

Organization: Mada Hotels

Duty Station: Jinja, Uganda

Mada Hotels Profile

Founded in 1982, Mada Hotels is one of East Africa’s leading hospitality service providers with properties spread throughout East Africa. Adventures Aloft Balloon Safaris is part of Mada services and offers Africa’s most famous game reserves including the Masai Mara, Serengeti and Tarangire National Park. They opened a new property in Namanve, Mukono called Kampala Nile Resort.

Job Summary

Waiters assist restaurant patrons by noting their order, serving tables their requested meals, and preparing bills at the end of the table’s meal. Waiters are also responsible for asking customers if they are satisfied with their meal and providing any assistance should the customer not be satisfied.

To be successful as a waiter you must have the endurance to stand for long hours and have patience with difficult customers. A good waiter anticipates the needs of customers and provides all services in a friendly manner.

Roles and Responsibilities:

- Greet customers and hand out menus.



- Take meal and beverage orders from customers and place these orders in the kitchen.



- Make menu recommendations and inform patrons of any specials.



- Deliver meals and beverages to tables when they have been prepared.



- Check that customers are satisfied with their meal.



- Prepare the bill for tables when requested.



- Cash up bills and ensure that the correct amount has been paid.



- Administer change to tables if needed.

Minimum Qualifications

- The applicant for the Mada Hotels Waiter/Waitress job should hold relevant qualifications



- Experience in the hospitality industry is required

How To Apply for Mada Hotels Jobs 2021

All candidates who wish to join the Mada Hotels in this capacity should Email a complete CV and cover letter to: fnbjnr@madahotels.com Or deliver physical copies to Jinja Nile Resort, Kimaka Road, Jinja, Uganda

Deadline: 25th December 2021

For similar Jobs in Uganda today and great Uganda jobs, please remember to subscribe using the form below:

NOTE:

No employer should ask you for money in return for advancement in the recruitment process or for being offered a position. Please contact Fresher Jobs Uganda if it ever happens with any of the jobs that we advertise.

Facebook



WhatsApp



Twitter



LinkedIn

gts:
How do sparkling wine producers adopt a sub-appellation? Evidence from an exploratory study on heroic Prosecco Superiore Rive

Luigino Barisan, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

Luigi Galletto, University of Padua, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

This paper investigates why wineries producing Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Protected Denomination of Origin (CVPP) wines decided to adopt the sub-appellation (SA) “Rive” as a way to increase the value of their wines.

We estimated both a logistic and a linear regression to explain Rive SA firms’ choices and market growth drivers, respectively. By using data gathered from CVPP producers, we divided wineries into two groups, those that have adopted the Rive SA and those that have not. By means of a stepwise procedure, we categorized factors that were likely to explain the Rive SA choice within a set of structural, marketing and wine tourism-related variables.

The results showed that structural drivers such as the human capital of younger producers, pressure tank sizes, competitive positioning in the market and in the field of wine tourism hospitality, and involvement in ad hoc promotional activities (i.e., Primavera del Prosecco) have the greatest effects on the choice of the Rive SA. The synergistic effects of cellar door sales, small firm sizes and specific foreign markets (i.e., the United Kingdom and the United States) have emerged, on the other hand, as vital factors in the growth of the Rive SA in terms of market share.

The adoption of the Rive SA may play an important role in supporting and valuing the heroic viticulture-based economy and may help the CVPP Tutelary Consortium to appropriately undertake promotional strategies to differentiate wines and improve competitiveness. This could have positive effects on wine tourism, hospitality and winery visits in light of the recent recognition of the CVPP as the 55th Italian UNESCO World Heritage site.

DOI: https://doi.org/10.36253/wep-9900

Read Full Text: https://oaj.fupress.net/index.php/wep/article/view/9900

gts:
Step 1: Brainstorming and Formulation of Ideas

The tone and the information should be understandable to the particular audience you are speaking to. Try to answer the obvious questions and build a relationship from early on.

Learn as much as possible about the topic and use common questions to expand your learning horizon.

Step 2: Speech Writing

In the beginning, the first thing you must do is to write down topics you want to focus on in bullet points with one or two sentences.

When writing distinguish three clear parts as Introduction, Description, and Conclusion. Here are some tips:

Startup with a curious fact, a Dramatic question, a quote, or a Story.

Be positive.

Make it short. Around 20 minutes.

The audience must know the problem and the proposed solution by the end.

Summarize before you finish.

Follow up with a motivating or inspiring finish.

Step 3: Practicing

The target is being natural while speaking. An occasional glance at your notes should be enough to remember. Here are some tips for practicing:

Practice in front of a mirror a few times. Get feedback from a friend.

Audiences are eager to hear what you have to say. So be clear and prompt.

Relevant gestures, occasional movement, and eye contact are very impactful. So use them often.

Keep your notes on the podium, and walk around.

Step 4: Visualize

Visualization of your topic and related things can be a very powerful thing if you do it right. Use PowerPoint presentations, photos, charts, and videos to make your point.

Hariprasath, the Duckworth-Lewis (D/L) method is a statistical approach used to adjust the target score in cricket matches that are interrupted before the completion of scheduled overs. This method was first introduced in 1992 during the World Cup, where England faced Australia in the semi-final. The incident where England lost 22 runs in 1 ball highlighted the complexity and unpredictability of the D/L method. This led to a debate about the rule's fairness and the need for a more straightforward system.

In 2003, the D/L method faced another significant challenge during the World Cup, particularly in the match between South Africa and Sri Lanka. The incident involving Mark Boucher, who dropped a simple chance, further exposed the flaws in the D/L method. This dropped single led to a significant reduction in the target score, which ultimately cost South Africa the match.

The D/L method is based on a series of mathematical equations that take into account the number of overs lost, the number of runs scored, and the number of wickets lost. However, its complexity often leads to confusion and controversy. Hariprasath argues that the D/L method should be simplified to make it more transparent and easier to understand for all stakeholders, including players, umpires, and spectators.

To summarize, the D/L method has been a contentious issue in cricket, with its complexity leading to several high-profile incidents. The 1992 World Cup incident and the 2003 South Africa vs. Sri Lanka match highlight the need for a more straightforward approach to managing interrupted matches.
</response>
gts:
By Hariprasath

Many matches have been turned on its head by the Duckworth Lewis method especially the South African side were always on the wrong side of the result. Even the cricket pundits had difficulty in grasping this rule. The complexity of this rule has led to many controversies, and the difficulty involved in calculating the appropriate score in the rain-affected matches has led to many chaotic situations.

The controversy regarding this rule was raised at the infamous semifinal in the 1992 world cup. South Africa's side was on the verge of victory before the rain interrupted. South Africa needed 22 of 13 to win before rain interrupted. Ten minutes later, the South African side was informed that they need to score 22 of 1 ball, and this incident raised all sorts of heated discussion on the Duckworth Lewis rule.

In the version of D/L most commonly in use in international and first-class matches (the ‘Professional Edition’), the target for Team 2 is adjusted simply in proportion to the two teams’ resources, i.e.,

For example, if a rain delay means that Team 2 only has 70% of resources available, and Team 1 scored 220 with 100% of resources available, then 220 × 70% / 100% = 154, so Team 2’s target is 154, and the score to tie is 153. The actual resource values used in the Professional Edition are not publicly available, so a computer that has this software loaded must be used.

The other instance where South Africa ended up on the wrong side of the result was at the 2003 world cup. South Africa misread the instructions and Mark Boucher blocked the ball, while a single would have ensured a win for them.

Sure! Here’s a brief explanation of 'Accounts from Incomplete Records':

Accounts from Incomplete Records refer to financial records that do not have complete information, such as missing transactions or partial entries. This can occur due to various reasons like human error, system failures, or incomplete data collection.

These accounts are used when full records are not available, and it's necessary to make financial adjustments based on the available data. For example, if a company has incomplete sales records, they might use these accounts to estimate sales figures for financial reporting purposes.

In contrast, the double-entry system is a more comprehensive method where every transaction is recorded in two accounts: one as a debit and one as a credit. This ensures that the accounting equation (Assets = Liabilities + Equity) remains balanced.

To help clarify, could you provide some specific examples of incomplete records you're working with?
</response>
gts:
Accounting records, which aren’t strictly kept consistent with the double-entry bookkeeping system are referred to as Accounts from incomplete records. Many authors describe it as a single entry system.

However, a single-entry bookkeeping system may be a misnomer because there’s no such system for maintaining accounting records. It is also not a ‘shortcut’ method as an alternate to the double-entry bookkeeping system. It is rather a mechanism of maintaining records whereby some transactions are recorded with proper debits and credits while just in the case of others, either one-sided or no entry is formed.

Accounts from Incomplete Records

Normally, under this technique records of money and private accounts of debtors and creditors are properly maintained, while the knowledge concerning assets, liabilities, expenses and revenues is partially recorded. Hence, these are usually referred to as accounts from incomplete records.

For more details please visit:https://www.manishco.com/accounts-from-incomplete-records/

I'd be happy to address both the physical and mental aspects of warming up as a singer or speaker. Here are some tips for overcoming embarrassment when others might hear your warmups:

1. **Practice in a Familiar Space**: Start by practicing in a space where you feel comfortable, like your home or a friend's house. Gradually work your way up to more public spaces.

2. **Record Yourself**: Record your practice sessions and listen back to them. This can help you identify areas for improvement and build confidence.

3. **Join a Supportive Community**: Look for local singing groups or online forums where you can practice with others. Supportive communities can provide encouragement and help you feel more comfortable.

For singers traveling in hotels who need private practice spaces, here are some strategies:

1. **Ask Front Desk for Quiet Rooms**: Many hotels have rooms designated for quiet use. Ask the front desk if they have any rooms that can be reserved for practice.

2. **Use Hotel Amenities**: Hotels often have quiet areas like libraries or lounges. These can be great for practicing without disturbing others.

3. **Pre-Book a Private Practice Room**: Some hotels offer private practice rooms for a fee. Check with the hotel’s concierge or front desk to see if this is available.

Would any of these tips be particularly helpful for you?
</response>
gts:
A lot of you might live in apartments with thin walls and feel embarrassed about singing and especially practicing those vocal exercises comfortably where others can here you. I know many of you resort to practicing in the car.

Some of you, are regular travelers and need to find a place whilst on the road, where you can still exercise the voice without feeling inhibited…staying in hotels.

When on stage for a performance, this is the part of us that we are happy to show to the world. The finished product. But the preparation to get us ready to be there, where we might make mistakes, we are experimenting, learning, warming up, trying new material…that is commonly the side of singing and public speaking which is not a public affair. We need to find a place where we are comfortable to perform these tasks.

As a singer and speaker, and particularly, someone who is establishing new techniques, it is important to exercise the voice on a daily basis. Your voice coach will hopefully have given you exercises to improve your breathing, strengthen your vocal cords, improve your range, pitch and vocal stamina.

So can you get over the phobia of practising when other people might hear you?

Firstly, I say…don’t be shy to be warming up your voice. It’s part of the preparation and it’s what will make you sound awesome on stage, and in everyday life as well as a speaker. If your a singer or a public speaker and your your good enough to have a gig, anyone hearing your warmups will not be thinking…oMg what an awful singer next door. Quite the opposite. Be bold and do what you have to do. Invite your neighbours to your gigs, rehearsals or to hear your run through your presentation or keynote.

Same when you are in a hotel. Who cares…you will most likely not have to see these guests again.

As for practicing in your car. It’s not a bad idea. Posture is not the best. But if you feel you have more privacy here and will be more effective then, it’s better than nothing at all. I do however recommend that you pull over and practice for the 10–20mins on the side of the road. Singing and vocalisation exercises can take quite a lot of concentration and some people even find the breathing can make them feel dizzy, so driving at the same time is not recommended.

Mariners lifer, Kyle Seager is closing the MLB chapter of his career. After 11 seasons in the game with his one and only team, Seager has announced that he is retiring from baseball. Gianmarco Castronovo reflects on the 3rd baseman’s career:

Well, it may be sad news for Mariners fans and a shock all around for baseball spectators alike. But for Kyle Seager, who announced his retirement on Wednesday with a Twitter post from his wife, Julie Seager — the career-long Mariner is “unbelievably excited for the next chapter of [his] life.”

Gianmarco Castronovo is sad to see Kyle Seager go from the game. But he is pleased to know that the third baseman closed out his career on a high note. 2021 was a strong season for Seager, who hit 35 home runs with 101 RBIs — career highs for the 34-year-old soon-to-be MLB retiree. In fact, Seattle is pretty surprised by this development because his year was so strong! Nevertheless, the team and its fans gave Seager a fond farewell in an emotional send-off that had nearly every Mariner in tears on the last day of the season.

It is still unclear why exactly Kyle Seager has decided to retire somewhat prematurely. Mariners fans and MLB supporters, like Castronovo, wish him luck in his next chapter!

gts:
RKI urges “maximum contact restrictions”

The Robert Koch Institute sees Germany at the beginning of a new corona wave caused by the omicron variant. Now the RKI advises clear measures — “immediately” and until next year. Mochi Dec 21, 2021·3 min read

spiegel.de 21.12.2021–12:55 a.m.

Translated by Michele Corlito

RKI head Lothar Wieler Photo: ANNEGRET HILSE / REUTERS

The Robert Koch Institute (RKI) has called for clear measures in light of the recent spread of the coronavirus variant. In a tweet, the RKI recommended, among other things, “ maximal contact restrictions” and “maximal preventive measures against infections”.

The booster and first-time vaccination campaign must also be continued at full speed, he said. Travel should be reduced to what is absolutely necessary. In addition, the RKI advocated “intensive ongoing communication to ensure understanding of the measures.

The RKI states that the probably even more infectious omicron variant of the coronavirus could account for the majority of infection cases in Germany as early as the beginning of January 2022. Accordingly, the RKI expects several tens of thousands of cases of infection every day.

Contact restrictions planned from December 28

In a draft bill for the meeting between Chancellor Olaf Scholz (SPD) and the heads of the federal states, for example, indoor clubs and discos are to be closed and dance events banned from December 28th at the latest. Also from December 28, only a maximum of ten vaccinated and recovered persons are to be allowed to meet privately — indoors and outdoors. Children 14 and under are not to be counted. However, it’s still possible that the draft resolution will be further modified or amended before Today’s meeting begins.

Great! Here’s a structured outline for your article on Facebook ad analysis, focusing on the key steps and metrics:

### Key Steps to Evaluate Ads
1. **Audience Targeting**: Define your target audience based on demographics, interests, and behaviors.
2. **Ad Creative**: Ensure your ad creative is compelling and aligns with your audience’s interests.
3. **Ad Placement**: Choose the right placements to maximize visibility and engagement.
4. **Ad Scheduling**: Optimize your ad schedule to reach your audience at the most effective times.
5. **Budget Allocation**: Allocate your budget efficiently to maximize ROI.

### Metrics to Focus On
1. **Click-Through Rate (CTR)**: Measures how many people clicked on your ad after seeing it.
2. **Conversion Rate**: Tracks the percentage of people who completed the desired action (e.g., made a purchase).
3. **Cost Per Click (CPC)**: The average amount you pay for each click on your ad.
4. **Return on Ad Spend (ROAS)**: Measures the revenue generated from your ad spend.
5. **Engagement Rate**: Measures how many people interacted with your ad (e.g., likes, comments, shares).

### Funnel Perspective
- **First Touchpoint**: Ads are the initial point of contact for cold audiences. Ensure your ad creative is engaging and relevant.
- **Thumbnail Effectiveness**: Use the formula: **Effectiveness% = (3-second video plays / total video plays)**. This metric helps you understand how effective your thumbnail is at capturing attention.

### Scroll-Stopping and Funnel Impact
- **Scroll-Stopping**: This refers to elements that keep users engaged and scrolling through your page. If underperforming, consider improving your ad copy, images, or calls-to-action.
- **Impact on Funnel**: Scroll-stopping elements can significantly impact the rest of the funnel. If they are weak, it can lead to lower engagement and conversions. Ensure these elements are optimized to drive users through the funnel.

Feel free to add any additional details or examples to make your article more comprehensive. Let me know if you need any specific examples or calculations.
</response>
gts:
Facebook

KNOW WHAT TO LOOK FOR!

Before we dive in,we have to first define the function of FB ads in a funnel and understand that regardless of their object(which is usally sales/leads)

Ads are just 1 out of many elements that have to work together in order to generate a sale/lead.

From this perspective,we look at cold audience ads as the initial contact with (your) brand,and as such — their function is to:

Grab attention relay the message(offer,product etc…) peak the audience interest push the traffic to the landing page

STEP 1:

Is your video ad stopping scrolls?

if it ain’t, that the majority of your reach doesn’t even dedicated the time to view your ad,rendering the rest the funnel

RELEVENT METRICS:

Reach Video Plays Second Video Plays

WHAT IF YOU DONT MEET THESE CRITERIA?

If your ad isn’t stopping scrolls,that points toward the following:

Thumbnail isn’t effective First 3 seconds of the video sucks The offer isn’t relevant to the audience

STEP 2 :

Is your thumbnail effective?

usually, we will test at least 5–10 thumbnails in order to determine this,butif you haven’t conducted an A/B test, here is how you can be more certain that the thumbnails is ineffective

RELEVANT MATRICS:

Reach Video plays 3-second video plays Thumb effectiveness

FORMULA:

3-second video/video plays=Effectiveness%

Anything below 35% is not as optimized as it should be,and it will most likely prove inferior in stopping the scrolls.

THIS DOSEN’T MEAN IT WON’T GENERATE SALES, IT JUST MEANS IT COULD DO BETTER!

THANK YOU, HAVE A NICE DAY!

Hey, here’s a draft of the article based on our outline:

---

**How to Grow on Instagram in 2022**

Growing your presence on Instagram can be a challenging but rewarding journey. In this article, we’ll cover essential strategies to help you build a strong following and engage with your audience effectively. By the end, you’ll have a clear plan to maintain consistency and grow your account.

**1. Define Your Brand and Target Audience**
Start by clearly defining your brand and the type of content you want to share. Understanding your target audience is crucial. Who are they? What do they like? What are their pain points? Tailoring your content to meet their needs will help you connect with them more effectively.

**2. Create High-Quality Content**
Content is king on Instagram. High-quality images and videos that are visually appealing and relevant to your audience will attract more followers. Invest in good photography and editing tools to ensure your posts stand out. Consistency is key, so plan your content in advance and stick to a posting schedule.

**3. Utilize Hashtags and Tags**
Hashtags are a powerful tool for increasing visibility. Research popular and relevant hashtags for your niche and use them consistently in your posts. This will help your content reach a wider audience. Additionally, using relevant tags can improve discoverability and engagement.

**4. Engage with Your Audience**
Engagement is vital for building a loyal following. Respond to comments and messages promptly. Ask questions and encourage your followers to share their thoughts. This interaction will help you build a community around your brand.

**5. Collaborate with Influencers and Brands**
Collaborating with influencers and brands can significantly boost your reach. Look for influencers in your niche who have a similar audience and reach out to them. Offer to collaborate on content or guest post opportunities. This can help you tap into their existing followers and expand your reach.

**6. Use Instagram Stories and Reels**
Instagram Stories and Reels are great for creating short, engaging content. Use these features to share behind-the-scenes content, sneak peeks, and interactive polls. Stories and Reels can increase engagement and help you build a more personal connection with your audience.

**7. Analyze and Adapt**
Regularly analyze your Instagram analytics to understand what’s working and what’s not. Look at metrics like follower growth, engagement rates, and post performance. Use this data to refine your strategy and make informed decisions about your content.

**Conclusion**
Growing on Instagram requires consistency, quality content, and a deep understanding of your audience. By following these steps, you can build a strong following and maintain a consistent presence on the platform. Remember, the key to success is to stay true to your brand and continuously improve your content.

---

This draft should be under 500 words and ends with a strong closing tip about consistency. Let me know if you need any adjustments or additional tips!
</response>

gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world’s most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele’s Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho’s Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew’s previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‘The Scorpion’ Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

gts:
Photo by Canva Studio from Pexels

Digital enterprises or online businesses are not bound by geography or stringent local regulations.

This makes it easier to start a business but it doesn’t make running the business any easier. Competition is fierce in almost every niche. Whatever your niche is, you should validate it by researching your competition. Let us explain how you should go about this and also why.

Step 1: Demand and Supply

The essence of most businesses can be boiled down to one reality, demand and supply.

If there is enough demand then you can cater to the supply. If there isn’t enough demand, then catering to supply doesn’t make any sense.

If there is only one diner in a locality, then it is likely to do well. If there are too many diners and not many people to fill up all those places, then most of those enterprises will run out of business.

Likewise, a digital enterprise or any online niche must have enough demand for there to be space to exist. While firms or endeavours can always coexist, the pie gets smaller and there is just less in it for everyone. The hard reality is that if there are enough players in a niche already and some of them have already amassed a massive market share, then penetrating their share or usurping a chunk of it will be a herculean task.

Study your competition to find out how large a market is and if some of your competitors are already catering to the needs of the audience. If you intend to do the same thing in the same niche, then there is little or no possibility for your enterprise to find a foothold, let aside being a roaring success.

Step 2: Niche within a Niche!

It is unlikely that the niche you have planned to target will be completely void of competition. There may be stiff or less competition. If there are players already with humongous market shares and dedicated customers or audiences, then you need to find a niche within a niche. You cannot cater to the same exact niche that your competition is committed to.

For instance, if you are planning to target the niche of food, cuisine or anything culinary, then you can find some subset that the existing players have not touched upon yet. If that is not possible, then you must figure out what you are best at and use that authority to create a niche within a niche.

It is all about the value you can offer to your audience and how you help, change or enrich their lives.

Sure! Here’s a draft for a short article about blockchain and cryptocurrencies in India, focusing on land record management and welfare distribution:

---

**Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies in India: Breaking Down Myths and Enhancing Transparency**

Blockchain technology has the potential to revolutionize various sectors, including land record management and welfare distribution. In India, these areas often suffer from significant issues of corruption and inefficiency. By leveraging blockchain, we can significantly reduce fraud and ensure transparency.

**Land Record Management**

Land records are a critical aspect of any country's governance. In India, land records are prone to corruption, leading to disputes and inefficiencies. Blockchain can help by providing a tamper-proof and transparent system for recording land transactions. Each transaction can be recorded on a blockchain, ensuring that all parties involved have access to the same, immutable record. This not only prevents fraud but also ensures that land records are accurate and up-to-date.

**Welfare Distribution**

Welfare schemes in India often face issues of corruption and inefficiency, leading to the misallocation of funds. Blockchain can help by creating a transparent and secure system for distributing welfare benefits. Each transaction can be recorded on a blockchain, ensuring that the funds are used as intended. This can help reduce corruption and ensure that the intended beneficiaries receive the benefits they deserve.

---

Would you like to add any specific details or examples to these points?
</response>
gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals…

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The “security” only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204⁸¹² possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person’s real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There’s one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you’ve done. Therefore, India should not ban “private” (i.e.. “decentralized”) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

Gurugram has seen rapid growth in recent years to become the largest industrial and financial hub of India. Gurgaon is home to more than 250 corporate offices belonging to Fortune 500 corporations and boasts the third highest per-capita revenue in India. Gurgaon is home to the headquarters of top IT, BFSI, and automobile companies such as BMW, Hyundai, Maruti and many more. Many startups are situated in Gurgaon that offers a variety of industries in terms of their products as well as services and size.

In just a few years, Webinfotechglobal collaborated with large MNCs along with a range of big and small businesses, as well as small-scale businesses by providing top-quality solutions to boost their digital presence and become the most effective digital marketing firm in Gurgaon.

Webinfotechglobal offers full digital marketing services, such as SEO Social Media Marketing influencer marketing, digital advertising programmatically, Email marketing, optimization of conversion and reputation management for online sites. As one of the top marketing firms located in Gurgaon, Webinfotechglobal is committed to providing high-quality and innovative digital marketing solutions to clients that align with their goals in business.

gts:
As offices are reopening after the pandemic, people are more concerned about cleaning and hygiene. Almost 73% of people think their workplace should be cleaned daily. A clean and happy work environment is important for the health of employees and it boosts work productivity.

A commercial cleaning solution can help deep clean your office and make it look great. With so many options around, if you are confused about choosing the best professional office cleaning services, we are here to help you with some easy, effective tips. Read this post and hire the right cleaning company for your workplace.

References and Reviews

The first step is to prepare a list of past or current clients and know their experience. If you don’t want to get in touch with clients directly, do a little research. The cleaning company’s online presence will help you learn about them. Search for a cleaning company in your location and read their reviews.

Attention to Detail

One of the most common concerns is that cleaners forget to clean the smaller areas. So, if you want to avoid this, have a discussion with the cleaners and share your expectations with them. Ask if they clean all areas, like corners, under desks, cobwebs and crumbs. Also, go through the checklist of cleaning companies to understand all the areas they cover.

A Knowledgeable Cleaner and Cleaning Process

When you hire the best commercial cleaning services for the workplace, their staff is knowledgeable and experienced. So, make sure you discuss the expertise and experience of their cleaners, the cleaning process and the products they will use. Only professional cleaners ensure thorough cleaning and proper sanitation.

Budget-Friendly Services

Keeping your budget in mind is essential before hiring any service. A higher price doesn’t always mean high quality services. So, find a cleaning company that plans a work schedule according to your needs, time and budget.

Wrapping Up

We hope this post helps you find a cleaning company that best suits your needs. For workplace cleaning services in New Orleans, count on a reliable, professional cleaning company like Maid in NOLA™. Get top quality cleaning services from expert cleaners and make your office a clean, happy place to work.

gts:
Deskimo

Not feeling like working from home or the office today? Forget Starbucks; book a Deskimo space. The Singapore-based on-demand co-working startup raised a $3M seed round just four months after launch.

It’s the future of work: 73% of employees now want flexible work to stay.

It’s founded by Raphael Cohen (ex-head of Asia at Rocket Internet) and Christian Mischler (co-founder of foodpanda).

Who cashed in? Y Combinator (YC S21), Global Founders Capital, Pioneer Fund, SeedX, Starling Ventures and TVSC.

⚙️ How it works

Deskimo works with companies with a hybrid or remote model to offer the service to their employees, who usually work from home. It’s not a new office — it’s for those days you need some extra focus or need to have a meeting outside the house.

Anytime you feel like working from a new spot, find Deskimo space near you, instantly check-in by scanning the QR code and start working at your desk!

Book a meeting room or desk at any of Deskimo’s 100+ locations with its app.

No burning $$$. Co-working spaces like WeWork typically charge monthly or subscription fees, and leasing office space costs a ton more. With Deskimo, pay only for the time used — not a minute more.

🙅🏻‍♀️ Not a WeWork!

Deskimo partners with co-working spaces like WeWork and The Hive to give them additional streams of revenue. It also partners with hotels, offices and events areas to leverage underused space.

It’s a win-win since Deskimo gets to offer more locations.

It looks for spaces outside CBDs for users to find desks near their homes. A third of their spaces are in residential areas.

✈️ Next stop

Currently active in Singapore and Hong Kong, the startup is expanding to Jakarta, Indonesia. It’s also testing out a few cool new features:

MedlinePlus Genetics — summary generated by Brevi Assistant

Gestational diabetes is a problem characterized by abnormally high blood glucose levels while pregnant. Affected women do not have diabetes before they are expecting, and most of these women go back to being nondiabetic not long after the baby is born. Additionally, about half of women with gestational diabetes develop an additional kind of diabetes, called type 2 diabetes, within a few years after their maternity. Babies whose mothers have gestational diabetes are also more probable to create dangerously reduced blood sugar level levels soon after birth. Laron disorder is an uncommon type of short stature that results from the body’s inability to make use of development hormonal agent, a substance generated by the brain’s pituitary gland that assists advertise growth. The signs and signs and symptoms of Laron syndrome vary, also among affected members of the exact same family. Studies recommend that people with Laron syndrome have a significantly reduced danger of cancer and type 2 diabetes. Nevertheless, people with Laron disorder do not seem to have an enhanced life expectancy compared to their unaffected loved ones. Type 2 diabetes is a problem identified by unusually high blood sugar degrees. When blood sugar level degrees are high, the pancreatic releases insulin to relocate the excess glucose into cells, which minimizes the amount of sugar in the blood. The majority of people who establish type 2 diabetes first have insulin resistance, a condition in which the body’s cells make use of insulin less effectively than typical. Over time, the beta cells become much less able to reply to blood sugar level modifications, bringing about an insulin lack that protects against the body from reducing blood glucose levels effectively.

**Title: New Partnership with The Rubbish Project: Focusing on Circular Economies and Reducing Plastic Waste**

The Rubbish Project is a company on a mission to create a waste-free world by providing circular economy solutions to the planet’s messiest problem, Rubbish.

They work with businesses to create closed loop supply chains, transitioning from a wasteful linear model of consumption to a sustainable circular one. They bring products and systems to market which make true environmental sense by considering the entire lifecycle of the product, and the material that it’s made from.

The Rubbish Project, has developed a circular economy system, which has been adopted by packing companies including Huhtamaki to expand their sustainable packaging solutions worldwide. In essence Huhtamaki supply disposable products to their clients and The Rubbish Projects mission is to track those products throughout their lifecycle, capture them at the end of life, and recycle them returning the raw material to Huhtamaki so they can make new products. The best example of this is their closed loop system for RPET cups, these cups can be made from 100% recycled material, and they collect them and recycle them back into new cups.

$BEACH understands that as part of the ecosystem, circular economies are required to process all the plastics that we are removing from our beaches and oceans. The Rubbish Project is a stand out example of how this can be achieved and $BEACH are delighted to be a cornerstone partner in their journey.

If you currently live in India and are looking to invest in reAlpha, we have good news for you. We’ve put together this blog post detailing exactly how to invest in reAlpha from India — complete with all of the steps you need to take in order to transfer your funds successfully.

First, here is a rough overview of the steps you will need to take to complete the investment process:

Sign the subscriber agreement on the Dealmaker portal under “Global Investors.” Select “wire transfer” as the payment method. Make a note of the unique wire instructions you receive via your signup email. Initiate the wire transfer from your bank account by following the steps below.

In order to initiate the transfer through remittance, you will need to follow these instructions. (Please note that this will be a capital account transaction.)

Log into your bank account. Click on “pay and transfer” or “payments.” Choose the account from which you want to pay. Select “international beneficiary account” or “add beneficiary.” Please note that you must fill in the full address of the beneficiary. Type in the amount you would like to invest in USD. (You can find a helpful currency converter here.) Please note, the minimum investment amount is $1,000 USD. Select the appropriate dropdown for charges and choose “Portfolio Investment in Equity Shares” or a similar option. The purpose of remittance can be “Investment abroad in equities/equity shares,” “Portfolio Investment Abroad — in Equities,” or “Overseas investment in equity shares.” Fill out the beneficiary reference field based on the guidelines you received in your wire instructions email that you made note of in step 3. Read and accept the declaration. Click continue. Accept the terms and conditions. Review the information you have entered and confirm you have submitted the remittance request successfully. Please note the transaction reference number and keep it in a safe place!

This investment can be made under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) of RBI.

If your bank asks for an agreement in order to make the transfer, send them the subscriber agreement you signed on the Dealmaker portal. Wire transfers from India will come as SWIFT payments. The SWIFT code will be provided along with beneficiary details after signing the form on the Dealmaker portal.

https://www.realpha.com/blog/investing-in-realpha-from-india
